attributes.action: Lets Have a new general election to vote for a new prime minister
attributes.additional_details: Over 2 million people have signed the petition to have another referendum, the people of Britain have spoken during the fist referendum , if we need another vote it should be a general election to elect a new prime minister for Britain.
attributes.background: The Vote on the Eu is now over, David Cameron has resigned, so lets have a general election to decide who runs this country next.
